statements: DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 101 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE blood_type = 'O-' AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND temperature > 37.5;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND blood_type = 'O+';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age = 40 AND diagnosis = 'Fever';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_date < '2022-01-01' AND blood_sugar > 150.5;
